sentences.sContent: The mendicant say: "if I called ten sound?" Women happy replied: "that I will give one thousand! "
sentences.sContent_eng: The mendicant say: "if I called ten sound?" Women happy replied: "that I will give one thousand! "
sentences.sCn: 乞丐说：“我要是叫十声呢？”富婆开心答道：“那我就给一千！”

sentences.sContent: This dear little naked mendicant pretends to be utterly helpless, so that he may beg for mother's wealth of love.
sentences.sContent_eng: This dear little naked mendicant pretends to be utterly helpless, so that he may beg for mother's wealth of love.
sentences.sCn: 这个可爱的小小的裸着身体的乞丐，所以假装着完全无助的样子，便是想要乞求妈妈的爱的财富。

remMethod.val: mend (修补； 改善) + icant → 乞丐的衣服缝缝补补又十年 → 乞丐

trans.tranOther: someone who asks people for money in order to live, usually for religious reasons
